mapper.insert: insert into fy_sell_publish(publisher_id, publisher_name, sell_title, sell_description,publish_time, image, sell_price, brand_name) values (#{publisherId}, #{publisherName}, #{sellTitle}, #{sellDescription}, #{publishTime}, #{image}, #{sellPrice}, #{brandName});
mapper.update: update fy_sell_publish set state = #{state} where sell_id = #{sellId}
mapper.select: select sell_id, sell_title, sell_description, image, sell_price from fy_sell_publish where state = 1 order by publish_time limit 8;
select sell_id, sell_title, sell_description, image, sell_price from fy_sell_publish where state = 1 order by sell_id
select sell_id, sell_title, sell_description, image, sell_price, state stateCode from fy_sell_publish where publisher_id = #{userId} order by sell_id
